StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDailyOrMonthlyResult]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RecruiterID uniqueidentifier = null, @OrgID int = null, @Year int, @Month int, @Day int = null
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyInterviewByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, NULL, @Year, @Month, @Day, 1) AS Interview,
USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyNwa (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Nwa, USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyMt (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Mt, USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyMq (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Mq, USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyMunq (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Munq,
USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyPt (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Pt, USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyPq (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Pq, USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyPunq (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Punq,
USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyCons (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Cons, USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyMpQual (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS MpQual, USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyContract (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day) AS Contract
END
